bibl.title: Navigare necesse est. Lighthouses from Antiquity to the Middle Ages. History, Architecture, Iconography and Archaeological Remains
bibl.seg: Baldassare Giardina, Navigare necesse est. Lighthouses from Antiquity to the Middle Ages. History, Architecture, Iconography and Archaeological Remains = BAR International Series. 2096.
Oxford, Archaeopress, 2010, 4°, vi-348 pp., 52 figg. et 116 pll. ISBN 978-1-4073-0572-1. £56.

C.R. par Enrico Felici, Tradizione, tecnologia e territorio. I = Topografia antica. 2 (Roma, 2012) pp. 197-208. - Marie-Christine Hellmann, RA 51 (2011) pp. 144-146. - R.J.C. Mowat, IJNA 40 (2011) pp. 209-210. - Steven L. Tuck, JRA 25 (2012) pp. 653-655.
